ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Completed'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Cannot Complete') ), AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Completed')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Cannot Complete')) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
You can not update the status of a Completed job.
If you are on the mobile device, click on this error then select 'Undo' to cancel this change.
